name: MYSTERY WORDS: ESCAPE ROOMS
description:
Closed to different rooms, where you need to get out! Keep thinking, planning to get out of here.

Are you ready to decipher the riddle and get out of the furthest rooms and rooms?

Do not hesitate, the game will not come to nothing!

Guess the mystery word and get out of the room. Each room has an object that will help with the solution.
Once you find it, enter the code. If you do not find out, do not get sad, you can ask for help.
